member.name: IDWriteFactory6.CreateFontCollectionFromFontSet
member.summary: From a font set, create a collection of fonts grouped into families.
member.param: A set of fonts to use to build the collection.
How to group families in the collection.
The address of a pointer to an interface. On successful completion, the function sets the pointer to a newly created font collection object, otherwise it sets the pointer to nullptr.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULTerror code.

member.name: IDWriteFactory6.CreateFontFaceReference
member.summary: Creates a reference to a specific font instance within a file.
member.param: A user-provided font file representing the font face.
The zero-based index of a font face in cases when the font file contains a collection of font faces. If the font file contains a single face, then set this value to zero.
Font face simulation flags for algorithmic emboldening and italicization.
A pointer to an array containing a list of font axis values. The array should be the size (the number of elements) indicated by the fontAxisValueCount argument.
The number of font axis values contained in the fontAxisValues array.
The address of a pointer to an interface. On successful completion, the function sets the pointer to a newly created font face reference object, otherwise it sets the pointer to nullptr.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULTerror code.

member.name: IDWriteFactory6.CreateFontResource
member.summary: Creates a font resource, given a font file and a face index.
member.param: A user-provided font file representing the font face.
The zero-based index of a font face in cases when the font file contains a collection of font faces. If the font file contains a single face, then set this value to zero.
The address of a pointer to an interface. On successful completion, the function sets the pointer to a newly created font resource object, otherwise it sets the pointer to nullptr.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULTerror code.

member.name: IDWriteFactory6.CreateFontSetBuilder
member.summary: Creates an empty font set builder, ready to add font instances to, and create a custom font set.
member.param: The address of a pointer to an interface. On successful completion, the function sets the pointer to a newly created font set builder object, otherwise it sets the pointer to nullptr.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULTerror code.

member.name: IDWriteFactory6.CreateFontSetBuilder
member.summary: Creates a text format object used for text layout.
member.param: Name of the font family from the collection.
Font collection. Use nullptr to indicate the system font collection.
A pointer to an array containing a list of font axis values. The array should be the size (the number of elements) indicated by the fontAxisValueCount argument.
The number of font axis values contained in the fontAxisValues array.
Logical size of the font in DIP units.
Locale name (for example, "ja-JP", "en-US", "ar-EG").
The address of a pointer to an interface. On successful completion, the function sets the pointer to a newly created text format object, otherwise it sets the pointer to nullptr.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULTerror code.

member.name: IDWriteFactory6.GetSystemFontCollection
member.summary: Retrieves a collection of fonts, grouped into families.
member.param: true if you want to include downloadable fonts. false if you only want locally installed fonts.
How to group families in the collection.
The address of a pointer to an interface. On successful completion, the function sets the pointer to a newly created font collection object, otherwise it sets the pointer to nullptr.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULTerror code.

member.name: IDWriteFactory6.GetSystemFontSet
member.summary: Retrieves the set of system fonts.
member.param: true if you want to include downloadable fonts. false if you only want locally installed fonts.
The address of a pointer to an interface. On successful completion, the function sets the pointer to the font set object, otherwise it sets the pointer to nullptr.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULTerror code.

summary.para: This interface represents a factory object from which all DirectWrite objects are created. IDWriteFactory6 adds new facilities for working with fonts and font resources.
